== About ==
PDXTeam is the Ubuntu user group for the city of Portland in the state of Oregon in the United States.

=== Meetings ===
Meetings are held on the 3rd Saturday each month at <nowiki>[[http://oldtownpizza.com/|Old Town Pizza]]</nowiki> in downtown Portland.  Meetings are open to any interested parties.  Please join the team <nowiki>[[http://lists.cameronbergh.com/listinfo.cgi/ubuntu-cameronbergh.com|mailing list]]</nowiki> if you would like to receive reminders and keep up to date on other happenings.  

Discussion and collaboration also takes place via IRC at irc://irc.freenode.net/#ubuntu-pdx

''Check <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PNWTeam/#head-9922a35951accbd5df00cb463e00adff8ac32905|here]]</nowiki> for a list of upcoming events.''

=== Goals ===
* Provide as much help to local ubuntu users as possible.
* Raise awareness regarding Ubuntu and other Open Source alternatives.
* Provide information and education resources like <nowiki>[[Pamphlet]]</nowiki> to the community.
* Spread Ubuntu

=== History ===
The PDX Team was started by CameronBergh (me@cameronbergh.com) in 2006.

Currently meetings are being organized by DanShufelt
